# inputImage

**Instance Property**

The image to use as an input image.

## Declaration

```swift
var inputImage: CIImage? { get set }
```

## Instance Properties

- **radius**: The distance from the center of the effect.
- **sharpness**: The amount of sharpening to apply.

items.description: The distance from the center of the effect.
